channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgrown foliage, 1st July
item.description:
The air shaft located at 460 Archway Road, Highgate, N6 4JB is over grown with foliage. Please can you arrange for the foliage to be cut back. Transport for London on their website suggest it is not their responsibility but to report on Fix My Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Archway Road, Muswell Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smelly overflowing bins, 1st July
item.description:
1 litter bin for 8 2 bed flats, always overflowing always smelly always has flies and maggots. Always encourages furniture and other larger items to be dumped around bin from flats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walters Yard, Plaistow, London

item.title: Vandalised Sign, 1st July
item.description:
People are regularly vandalising the recently installed Permit Parking Restriction signs in the Silwood Estate. Here's one example on Oldfield Grove. The yellow lines outside the entrance to 1 Concorde Way haven't been completed either.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldfield Grove, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Third large dump in ten days!!, 1st July
item.description:
Yet another large Flytip has been made almost in the same place as the council cleared at the weekend and opposite the one cleared the weekend before that at the entrance to the Weir Hall Avenue cul-de-sac, N18. Surely now you will be sending investigators out to go through the bags, gather doorbell and CCTV footage or placing covert cameras yourselves instead of just chucking potential evidence to catch these people in the back of a truck with all the rest of the crap collected???? Enfield residents who pay their council tax deserve more for their money or can any of us now just dump stuff anywhere without fear or reprisals??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Weir Hall Avenue, Bowes, London
Report on FixMyStreet
